detail_desc: Push-up lace bralette with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, raw, roll edges around the neckline, and short slits at the hem. Longer at the back.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour stripes down the sleeves and a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short top in soft, printed jersey with short sleeves and ties at the hem.

Calf-length dress in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide top with a wide, ribbed seam at the waist, slits at the sides of the hem, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a high V-neck and long sleeves.
Fully lined swimsuit with a sculpting effect that holds in and shapes the tummy and bum. Cups with removable inserts, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and decorative gathers in the sides.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and contrasting colour stripes down the sleeves.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Dungarees and a short-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton. Dungarees in woven fabric with buttons at the sides, straps with adjustable buttoning, a chest pocket and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.Covered elastication at the back of the waist and around the hems. Top in jersey with a press-stud on the shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a detachable belt in braided imitation suede.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Flip-flops with fabric straps and fluted rubber soles.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and wide, tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Slim-fit joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and medium coverage at the back.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in airy, striped jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared, jersey-lined skirt.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with an elasticated top with a small frill trim, narrow tie-top shoulder straps and short, wide sleeves.
Scarf in a soft weave with a lightly brushed finish and fringe trims along the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside. Gathered side seams for best fit.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric. Narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps, a small frill trim around the neckline and gathered seams creating tiers in the skirt for added volume. Lined.
Fine-knit jumper in a viscose blend with a soft, brushed finish. Wide neckline, long dolman sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Shirt in a supersoft viscose weave with a collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Blouse in a cool viscose weave with a grandad collar, button placket and gathered neckline. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, slub cotton jersey with an appliqué on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless dress in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif, seam at the waist and lined tulle skirt.
V-neck top in airy jersey with a button placket, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline. Straight cut with a slit in one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft modal and cotton jersey with a rounded hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Cropped top in ribbed cotton jersey with a wide, round neckline, short sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with straight, wide legs. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Pull-on jeans in stretch denim with elastication and a small frill at the waist and fake front pockets. Loose fit with gently tapered legs. Patterned jersey lining.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Wide, ankle-length dress in softly draping, patterned silk with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a gathered seam at the hips and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Knee-length dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood, side pockets and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Small, glittery shoulder bag in the shape of a star with a print motif on one side, zip at the top and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap in imitation leather. Lined. Size approx. 4x17x17 cm.

Suit trousers in a textured weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, extended waistband with a concealed button and zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit top in a sturdy viscose blend with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with pleats and pleats at the waist.
Nightdress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short, elasticated raglan sleeves and an elasticated neckline.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in lightly crêped jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps, a double-layered bodice and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Dress in woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a flounced trim, and a flounce at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details at the hem and short raglan sleeves with reflective details. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal chain necklace. Length 57 cm.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and open heels with a strap. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles.
Joggers in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs with short slits at the hems.
Fully lined bikini top with a metal fastener at the back and back of the neck.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Top in soft jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and a flounce at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Leggings in stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and a motif on the front.

Car coat in twill with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, diagonal welt front pockets and inner pockets. Long raglan sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined in satin made from recycled polyester.
Strapless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a frilled edge at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.

Long-sleeved, fitted running top in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm. The polyester content of the scarf is partly recycled.
Thigh boots in stretch imitation suede with pointed toes, block heels and a zip at the bottom. Fabric and imitation suede linings, and imitation leather insoles. Heel 7 cm.

Padded parka in woven fabric. Detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and a single back vent. Diamond-quilted lining in recycled polyester.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder jersey top in a soft viscose blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Suede platform trainers with an ankle-height shaft and zip at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform back 3.5 cm, front 2 cm.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Long dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back and short butterfly sleeves. Elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist. Lined.

Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs, hem and back of the neck. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a padded top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Padded jacket with a detachable, padded, faux fur-trimmed hood, stand-up collar and zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Patch pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, side pockets, elasticated cuffs and reflective details. Lined.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Cropped top in stretch jersey with contrasting colour flatlock seams.
